review_text: I had the pleasure of visiting in March, during a beautiful sunny spring morning. I cannot recommend it enough. The greenery was so calming, as was the silence broken by nothing but birds chirping. Definitely one of my favourite places I've ever visited.
Just found out about this place right around the corner. Itâ€™s absolutely gorgeous! Also huge gratitude to all the volunteers who maintain this gem.
A hidden treasure in Amsterdam, this public garden is host to and old cemetery. I've spent over an hour walking in the garden, didn't meet a single soul. A very well recommended getaway spot in town.
If you like this kind of thing and you're wondering if this is worth a bike ride from where you are, it is. Just big enough for some meandering, and one of prettiest cemeteries I've ever seen.
A sanctuary of peace and quiet. Literally a monumental place to be cherished and protected from the hasty world outside. Now and forever.
Extremely beautiful, quiet place, away from busy Amsterdam! Perfect for meditation.
Definitely worth a short visit. Some graves are more than a century old.
beautiful place like a  dream of old times forgotten in a busy always changing city
